description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. WARR is a world domination strategy game of risk and conquest where players battle for global control. Key features of  WARR include: - Multiple Maps - Multiple Difficulty Levels - Multiple types of Artificial Intelligence
